opts <- options(knitr.kable.NA = "")

library(dplyr, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
library(saros)
library(ggplot2)
# library(ggiraph)
library(knitr)
ggiraph::set_girafe_defaults(
  opts_hover = ggiraph::opts_hover(css = ggiraph::girafe_css(
        css = glue::glue("fill:{font_color};"), #"stroke:white;fill:#2D8E9F;"
        text = glue::glue("stroke:none;fill:{font_color};fill-opacity:1;"))),
  opts_hover_inv = ggiraph::opts_hover_inv(css = "opacity:0.4"))
kable <- function(data, ...) {
   kabled <- knitr::kable(data, ...)
   kableExtra::kable_styling(kabled, 
                             bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"), 
                             full_width = FALSE, 
                             position = "center",
                             htmltable_class = "lightable-hover")
}
knit_print.data.frame <- function(x, ...) {
  res <- paste(c("", "", kable(x)), collapse = "\n")
  knitr::asis_output(res)
}
